channel.title: Help with Testscape
channel.description:
For some reason, i cannot change the player level of my character to admin or owner.
help?

item.title: Help with Testscape
item.dc:creator: @Rum0 Rum0
item.description:
@Rum0 wrote:

Search for this

//start of moderator/admin list

You should see a big list with names and player rights it would look like this might be diffrent for you.

[code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“n0valyfe”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“rum0”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Tu-Jesse”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“redrover8”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pwnzor69”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“smitty”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“stoned4life1”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lemonslayer”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“inuyasha”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“bdawgx”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“dwd”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“xN00bxfrei”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}[/code]

now what you do is: 1 means silver crown 2 means gold crown 3 means owner(no gold crown)

So what you do is where the names are you edit them to the names you want to be the mods or admins or owners :.
Hope this helps

Read full topic
